sys_remote_update_set.description:
A utility to assist with reviewing skipped updates following an instance upgrade.
-- New in v2.0 --
- Progress tracker during log re-build - Incremental re-build; can be resumed if it does not complete for any reason - Retrieve update information from previous upgrades - Retrieve update information from other instances (instances need Upgrade Assistant installed) - New rule to interpret retrieved information - Ability to re-run build or re-apply rules for individual log entries - Improved logging and performance data - Help updates and other fixes
sys_remote_update_set.name: [ws] Upgrade Assistant v2.0
